title: So my game just disappeared?!
body: Eh... so I was just in a game where we were literally just about to win. The nexus was on half health and we were going to rush it and end... then suddenly: "attempting to reconnect". It was like that for a good three minutes, and my internet was fine, so I decided that the game must've ended without me and that's why I couldn't connect. Then I closed the client and... wtf, the game doesn't even exist anymore! It's not a ghost game as I can join the queue, but it's not showing up in match history. What's happened? It was a provisional match so I want that win to count... :/

replies.body:
What does your ranked history say? There are known problems with the Match History beta, so I'd just avoid using that for now.

Did you ever get to a screen that said, "Match in progress, please reconnect"?
